title: Provides that supervision fees for parolees shall be collected at a central location and shall not be collected by parole officers
summary: Provides that supervision fees for parolees shall be collected at a central location and shall not be collected by parole officers.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1363

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. JEFFRIES, PEOPLES-STOKES -- Multi-Sponsored by --
         M.  of  A. FINCH, GIGLIO, McDONOUGH, ROBINSON, WRIGHT -- read once and
         referred to the Committee on Governmental Operations

       AN ACT to amend the executive law, in  relation  to  the  collection  of
         supervision fees from parolees

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 9 of section 259-a  of  the  executive  law  is
    2  amended by adding a new paragraph (f) to read as follows:
    3    (F) NOTWITHSTANDING ANY OTHER LAW, RULE OR REGULATION TO THE CONTRARY,
    4  THE  SUPERVISION  FEE  AUTHORIZED  BY  THIS  SUBDIVISION  SHALL  NOT  BE
    5  COLLECTED BY THE PAROLE OFFICER OF A  PERSON  ON  PAROLE.  THE  DIVISION
    6  SHALL  DESIGNATE  A  CENTRAL  LOCATION  AND  ADDRESS FOR PAYMENT OF SUCH
    7  SUPERVISION FEE BY PERSONS ON PAROLE.
    8    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately, provided,  however,  that
    9  the  amendments  to  subdivision 9 of section 259-a of the executive law
   10  made by section one of this act shall not affect the expiration of  such
   11  subdivision and shall be deemed to expire therewith.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02462-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the collection of supervision fees from parolees
